def maxScoreSightseeingPair(values):
    max_value = values[1]
    max_score = float('-inf')
    for i in range(1, len(values)):
        max_score = max(max_score, max_value + values[i] - i)
        max_value = max(max_value, values[i] + i)
    return max_score

def maxScoreSightseeingPair(values):
    max_value = values[0]
    max_score = float('-inf')
    for i in range(1, len(values)):
        max_score = max(max_score, max_value * values[i] - i)

    return max_score
